mapper.insert: insert into hive_login_log ( login_log_id, org_id, member_id, module_type, login_time, gmt_create, gmt_modify ) values ( #{loginLogId}, #{orgId}, #{memberId}, #{moduleType}, #{loginTime}, now(3), now(3) )
mapper.select: from hive_login_log where org_id = #{orgId} and member_id = #{memberId} and module_type = #{moduleType} order by gmt_create desc limit 1
select count(*) from hive_login_log where org_id = #{orgId} and member_id = #{memberId} and module_type = #{moduleType}
mapper.sql: select login_log_id, org_id, member_id, module_type, login_time, gmt_create, gmt_modify
